Which command adds a static route to a network?

1. ip route add
2. ip addr add
3. ip link set

Please give the number(s) of the correct answer(s), separated by spaces.

Which command is used to configure an IP address?

1. ip addr add
2. ip route add
3. ip link set

Please give the number(s) of the correct answer(s), separated by spaces.
